Chinese.name: 混流音视频录制
Chinese.description: 基于云函数+TRTC+COS+ffmpeg实现混流音视频录制。可配合CFS实现长时间混流音视频录制，并将生成的FLV录制文件转码MP3/MP4格式转储到指定的COS桶持久保存。
Chinese.attention: 模版函数需要配置函数URL触发器。

author.name: 腾讯云无服务器云函数团队

English.name: MixRecorder
English.description: This example demonstrates mix-stream recording based on TRTC service, and push recording files to cos bucket.
English.attention: This example needs to configure the function trigger.
